mapper.select: SELECT p.picture_name,s.store_num, s.store_title, s.store_start, s.store_end FROM store s JOIN favorite f ON f.store_num = s.store_num JOIN picture p ON p.store_num = s.store_num WHERE f.member_num = #{customerNum} AND p.picture_type = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite(favorite_num, member_num, store_num, favorite_status) VALUES(favorite_sequence.nextval, #{memberNum}, #{storeNum}, 1)
